where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select id, code, date_format(clear_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS clearDate, clear_man_name AS clearManName, audit_man_name AS auditManName, remark, flow_code AS flowCode from saas_goods_clear where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND id = #{id}
